flawed_nl_solution:
2 apples cut into 8 slices each is 2*8=<<2*8=16>>16 slices
2/8ths of the apple slices is 16*3/8=128/3 slices
Tom had 16-128/3=<<16-128/3=-80/3>>-80/3 slices
Tom then ate half the slices so he has -80/3/2=<<-80/3/2=-40/3>>-40/3 slices
#### -40/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 128/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
